Name: Black Diamond
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of grated white chocolate.
Garnish with a dusting of white chocolate grated over cocktail.
Review: This flavoursome mix of coffee and chocolate is further enhanced if vanilla-infused rum is used.
History: Created in March 2004 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Diamond contains 158 calories
